full_summary:
### Government Tender

**Tender Title:** Thermal Ionisation Mass Spectrometer

**Reference Number:** WS4151590983-Doc4203538980

**Status:** Expired

**Solicitation Number:** WS4151590983

**Publication Date:** 2023-09-12

**Closing Date:** 2023-10-06T14:00:00

### Summary

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Natural Resources (NRCan) invites proposals for the replacement of the current Thermal Ionisation Mass Spectrometer (TIMS). The existing TIMS, in use since 2001, is at the end of its expected lifecycle. The solicitation seeks to acquire a new instrument that meets the mandatory requirements specified in the Request for Proposal.

### Key Dates

* Publication Date: 12 September 2023
* Closing Date: 6 October 2023, 14:00 EDT
* Expected Contract Start Date: 20 October 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: 31 March 2025

### Requirements

* The successful bidder must meet the mandatory requirements detailed in the Request for Proposal.
* Delivery to Ottawa, Ontario must be on or before 31 March 2024.
* Bidders must ensure all required supporting documentation and bid submission are submitted by 6 October 2023, 14:00 EDT. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information

* Name: Wijaya Putri, Yessica Karnali
* E-mail: [yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:yessicakarnali.wijayaputri@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is open to bidders from countries that have a trade agreement with Canada, including:

* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* ...and others

### Classification

This procurement falls under the UNSPSC category:

* Laboratory and scientific equipment
* UNSPSC code: *41100000*
